name: Chef Apron
description:
## Chef Apron

If you are baking cakes don't forget your Apron! The mark of a true baker.

### Bumpkins.io

Deposit this wearable in Sunflower Land to equip it on your Bumpkin

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
